name: Valsartan HCT
functioning: Valsartan blocks AT1 receptors reducing vasoconstriction, HCTZ increases urine output reducing blood volume.

name: Furosemide Injection
functioning: Inhibits sodium-potassium-chloride cotransporter in loop of Henle, increasing urine production and reducing edema.

name: Aspirin EC
functioning: Irreversibly acetylates COX-1, preventing platelet aggregation and reducing clot formation.

name: Clopidogrel Bisulfate
functioning: Irreversibly blocks P2Y12 ADP receptors on platelets, preventing aggregation.

name: Isosorbide Mononitrate
functioning: Releases nitric oxide, causing vasodilation and reducing cardiac preload and afterload.

name: Bisoprolol Fumarate
functioning: Selectively blocks beta-1 adrenergic receptors, reducing heart rate and myocardial contractility.

name: Atenolol Tablets
functioning: Selectively blocks beta-1 adrenergic receptors, lowering heart rate and blood pressure.

name: Amlodipine Besylate
functioning: Blocks L-type calcium channels in vascular smooth muscle, causing vasodilation and reducing blood pressure.

name: Glimepiride
functioning: Stimulates insulin release from pancreatic beta cells by blocking ATP-sensitive potassium channels.

name: Gliclazide MR
functioning: Stimulates insulin secretion from pancreatic beta cells, improving glycemic control.

name: Insulin Aspart
functioning: Mimics natural insulin, facilitating glucose uptake into cells and regulating blood sugar rapidly.

name: Insulin Detemir
functioning: Provides steady basal insulin levels over 24 hours without peaks, mimicking endogenous insulin.

name: Humulin R
functioning: Rapidly controls blood glucose levels after meals by facilitating cellular glucose uptake.

name: NovoLog
functioning: Quickly lowers blood glucose by enhancing cellular glucose uptake.

name: Levemir
functioning: Provides consistent insulin action throughout the day for basal control.

name: Apidra
functioning: Rapidly mimics postprandial insulin response for tight blood sugar management.

name: Toujeo
functioning: Delivers steady basal insulin over an extended period with a flat profile.

name: Tresiba
functioning: Provides ultra-long basal insulin coverage with minimal variability.

name: Fiasp
functioning: Even faster onset for mealtime glucose control.

name: Glucerna SR
functioning: Provides balanced nutrition with controlled carbohydrates and sustained energy release for diabetic patients.

name: Ensure Plus
functioning: Complete balanced nutrition with higher calories for patients unable to eat normally.

name: Pediasure Complete
description: Nutritional supplement for children, complete formula.
functioning: Provides essential nutrients, vitamins, and minerals for optimal growth and development in children.

name: ORS Plus
functioning: Replaces lost electrolytes and water in dehydration, maintaining fluid balance.

name: Diloxanide Furoate
functioning: Kills protozoa in the intestinal tract by disrupting their metabolic processes.

name: Hyoscine Injection
functioning: Blocks muscarinic receptors in smooth muscle, reducing spasms in gastrointestinal and urinary tracts.

name: Dimenhydrinate Tablets
functioning: Blocks histamine and acetylcholine receptors in the vestibular system, preventing motion sickness.

name: Loperamide Capsules
functioning: Slows intestinal motility by acting on opioid receptors in the gut wall.

name: Micronized Flavonoid
functioning: Strengthens capillary walls and improves venous tone, reducing edema and inflammation.

name: Multivitamin Forte
functioning: Supplements essential vitamins for overall health, immune function, and metabolism.

name: Vitamin E Capsules
functioning: Acts as an antioxidant, protecting cell membranes from oxidative damage.

name: Calcium Carbonate + D3
functioning: Provides calcium for bone health and vitamin D3 for calcium absorption.

name: Calcium Citrate
functioning: Supplies calcium for bone density, muscle, and nerve function.

name: Calcium Lactate
functioning: Supports bone health and prevents calcium deficiency.

name: Condom Ultra
functioning: Provides barrier protection against STIs and unwanted pregnancy.

name: Gaviscon Advance
functioning: Forms a protective barrier over stomach contents, preventing acid reflux.

name: Maalox Plus
functioning: Neutralizes stomach acid and reduces gas and bloating.

name: Rennie Extra
functioning: Contains calcium carbonate and magnesium carbonate to neutralize excess stomach acid.

name: Buscopan Compound
functioning: Hyoscine reduces spasms, paracetamol provides additional pain relief.

name: Mebeverine HCl
functioning: Relaxes intestinal smooth muscle by inhibiting calcium influx.

name: Phloroglucinol Trimethylphloroglucinol
functioning: Relaxes smooth muscle in gastrointestinal tract, reducing pain and spasms.

name: Cetirizine Dihydrochloride
functioning: Blocks histamine H1 receptors, relieving allergy symptoms.

name: Clarithromycin Tablets
functioning: Binds to bacterial ribosomes, inhibiting protein synthesis.

name: Clarithromycin Suspension
functioning: Inhibits bacterial protein synthesis by binding to 50S ribosomal subunit.

name: Levofloxacin Eye Drops
functioning: Inhibits bacterial DNA gyrase in ocular infections.

name: Meropenem Injection
functioning: Beta-lactam antibiotic that inhibits bacterial cell wall synthesis.

name: Enoxaparin Sodium
functioning: Inhibits factor Xa and thrombin, preventing blood clot formation.

name: Rivaroxaban Tablets
functioning: Directly inhibits factor Xa, preventing thrombin generation.

name: Apixaban Tablets
functioning: Selectively inhibits factor Xa, reducing thrombin generation.

name: Dabigatran Etexilate
functioning: Direct thrombin inhibitor, preventing fibrin clot formation.

name: Imatinib Mesylate
functioning: Inhibits tyrosine kinase enzymes involved in cancer cell proliferation.

name: Trastuzumab Injection
functioning: Targets HER2 receptors on cancer cells, inhibiting their growth.

name: Bevacizumab Injection
functioning: Blocks VEGF, preventing angiogenesis in tumors.

name: Paclitaxel Injection
functioning: Stabilizes microtubules, preventing cancer cell division.

name: Goserelin Implant
functioning: Reduces hormone levels that stimulate certain cancers.

name: Letrozole Tablets
functioning: Inhibits aromatase, reducing estrogen production in breast cancer.

name: Tamoxifen Citrate
functioning: Blocks estrogen receptors in breast cancer cells.

name: Methotrexate Injection
functioning: Inhibits folate metabolism, preventing DNA synthesis in cancer cells.

name: Cytarabine Injection
functioning: Incorporates into DNA, inhibiting replication in cancer cells.

name: Vincristine Injection
functioning: Binds to tubulin, preventing microtubule formation and cell division.

name: Cyclophosphamide Injection
functioning: Alkylates DNA, preventing cancer cell replication.

name: Doxorubicin Injection
functioning: Intercalates DNA and inhibits topoisomerase II, causing DNA damage.

name: Etoposide Injection
functioning: Inhibits topoisomerase II, preventing DNA replication.

name: Ifosfamide Injection
functioning: Alkylates DNA guanine residues, causing cross-links and strand breaks.

name: Mesna Injection
functioning: Protects bladder from toxic metabolites of ifosfamide and cyclophosphamide.

name: Chlorambucil Tablets
functioning: Alkylates DNA, inhibiting cancer cell proliferation.

name: Mercaptopurine Tablets
functioning: Inhibits purine synthesis, preventing DNA and RNA production.

name: Azathioprine Tablets
functioning: Inhibits purine synthesis, suppressing immune cell proliferation.

name: Mycophenolate Mofetil
functioning: Inhibits inosine monophosphate dehydrogenase, blocking lymphocyte proliferation.

name: Cyclosporine Capsules
functioning: Inhibits calcineurin, preventing T-cell activation.

name: Tacrolimus Capsules
functioning: Inhibits calcineurin, suppressing T-cell mediated immune response.

name: Disprin CV
functioning: Inhibits COX enzymes, reducing pain, fever, and inflammation.

name: Advil Liquid
functioning: Blocks COX-1 and COX-2 enzymes, reducing prostaglandin production.

name: Tylenol Extra Strength
functioning: Blocks pain signals in the brain and reduces fever by hypothalamic action.

name: Benadryl Syrup
functioning: Blocks histamine H1 receptors, relieving allergy symptoms.

name: Allegra Tablets
functioning: Selectively blocks peripheral histamine H1 receptors.

name: Sudafed PE
functioning: Stimulates alpha-adrenergic receptors, constricting nasal blood vessels.

name: Mucinex Extended
functioning: Increases respiratory tract fluid secretion, loosening mucus.

name: Robitussin AC
functioning: Codeine suppresses cough, guaifenesin loosens mucus.

name: Pepto-Bismol Chewables
functioning: Coats irritated intestinal lining and reduces inflammation.

name: Imodium Instant
functioning: Slows gut motility and reduces gas and bloating.

name: Gas-X Softgels
functioning: Breaks up gas bubbles in digestive tract.

name: Tums Smoothies
functioning: Neutralizes stomach acid to relieve heartburn and indigestion.

name: Alka-Seltzer Plus

name: Advil PM Caplets
description: Ibuprofen 200mg + Diphenhydramine 38mg, pain reliever and sleep aid.

name: Tylenol PM Tablets

name: DayQuil LiquiCaps
functioning: Relieves cold symptoms including fever, cough, and congestion.

name: NyQuil LiquiCaps

name: Theraflu Express
functioning: Multi-symptom relief for colds and flu.

name: Mucinex D
functioning: Loosens mucus and relieves congestion.

name: Claritin RediTabs
functioning: Blocks histamine receptors to relieve allergy symptoms.

name: Flonase Nasal Spray
functioning: Reduces nasal inflammation and congestion.

name: Singulair Chewables
functioning: Blocks leukotrienes to prevent asthma and allergy symptoms.

name: ProAir HFA

name: Symbicort Turbuhaler
functioning: Corticosteroid reduces inflammation, long-acting bronchodilator opens airways.

name: Advair Diskus
functioning: Anti-inflammatory and long-acting bronchodilator combination.

name: Spiriva HandiHaler
functioning: Blocks muscarinic receptors for sustained bronchodilation.

name: Crestor Tablets
functioning: Inhibits HMG-CoA reductase to lower cholesterol.

name: Zocor Tablets
functioning: Reduces cholesterol synthesis in the liver.

name: Pravachol Tablets
functioning: Lowers LDL cholesterol and triglycerides.

name: Mevacor Tablets
functioning: Inhibits cholesterol production.

name: Lescol XL
functioning: Reduces hepatic cholesterol synthesis.

name: Zetia Tablets
functioning: Blocks cholesterol absorption in the small intestine.

name: Welchol Tablets
functioning: Binds bile acids to lower cholesterol.

name: Tricor Tablets
functioning: Reduces triglycerides and increases HDL cholesterol.

name: Lopid Capsules
functioning: Lowers triglycerides and LDL, raises HDL.

name: Niaspan Extended
functioning: Lowers LDL and triglycerides, raises HDL.

name: Cordarone Tablets
functioning: Blocks potassium channels to stabilize heart rhythm.

name: Lanoxin Tablets
functioning: Increases myocardial contractility and slows heart rate.

name: Coumadin Tablets
functioning: Inhibits vitamin K-dependent clotting factors.

name: Heparin Injection
functioning: Enhances antithrombin III activity to prevent clotting.

name: Lovenox Syringes
functioning: Inhibits factor Xa and thrombin.

name: Fragmin Injection
functioning: Anticoagulant for prevention of blood clots.

name: Innohep Injection
functioning: Prevents deep vein thrombosis and pulmonary embolism.

name: Arixtra Injection
functioning: Selective factor Xa inhibitor.

name: Aggrenox Capsules
functioning: Dual antiplatelet therapy to prevent stroke.

name: Effient Tablets
functioning: Irreversibly blocks P2Y12 receptors on platelets.

name: Brilinta Tablets
functioning: Reversibly blocks P2Y12 receptors.

name: Persantine Tablets
functioning: Inhibits platelet aggregation and vasodilation.

name: Integrilin Injection
functioning: Blocks GP IIb/IIIa receptors on platelets.

name: Reopro Injection
functioning: Monoclonal antibody blocking GP IIb/IIIa receptors.

name: Angiomax Injection
functioning: Direct thrombin inhibitor for cardiac procedures.

name: Refludan Injection
functioning: Recombinant hirudin derivative inhibiting thrombin.
